subjects.prerequisites: Basic Knowledge of the English Language
course_outcomes: Express ideas with clarity and precision, and articulate themselves with confidence.
Apply effective reading strategies, analyse content and develop comprehension skills through rapid reading techniques.
Develop writing skills, identify errors, editorialize and write various technical and non-technical content using proper style and language.
Apply self-assessment techniques to identify areas for personal growth in communication skills and use goal-setting strategies to enhance productivity.
Describe atomic and molecular structure in terms of wave functions and represent energy levels via spectroscopic methods.
Interpret periodic variation of elemental properties and deduce quantitative information about heat engines.
Establish molecular orbital diagrams and relate electrochemistry to thermodynamics.
Relate empirical rate constants to molecular processes and evaluate experiments in chemical equilibria and kinetics.
Develop knowledge of fundamental properties of organic compounds and analyze changes in orbital energy levels in coordination compounds.

subjects.prerequisites: Basic Knowledge of Set Theory, Linear Algebra and Calculus
course_outcomes: Remember and understand descriptive statistics and solve problems in correlation and regression.
Recall and apply basic probability concepts including conditional probability and Bayesâ€™ Theorem.
Understand random variables and analyze common probability distributions.
Illustrate estimation theory and apply estimation techniques such as MLE and method of moments.
Describe and apply hypothesis testing methods including Z-test, T-test, F-test and ANOVA.

subjects.prerequisites: Knowledge of basic Biology of Class 12th
course_outcomes: Remember and understand basic biological principles and organizational structure of living systems at molecular level.
Understand energy transformations and information processing in biological systems from an engineering perspective.
Know different biosensors and evaluate their applications in bio-engineering contexts.
Analyze programming algorithms and compare different models (in bioinformatics/biological computation contexts).
Define, describe and develop algorithms and flowcharts to solve logical and numerical problems.
Explain and apply arithmetic, logical and conditional expressions to develop C programs.
Describe and classify loop structures to solve problems using C.
Differentiate among functions and determine their applications to structure programs.
Define and differentiate structures and data storage to illustrate data handling in C programming.
Identify common errors in speaking and writing English and apply proper grammar and sentence structures.
Read with proper vocabulary and pronunciation and employ academic, non-academic and technical writing.
Apply listening and speaking skills effectively for industry and entrepreneurship.
Think critically and express ideas fluently in English.
Examine water testing parameters and predict water quality.
Explain and evaluate liquid properties like viscosity and surface tension.
Describe conductometric and pH metric titration and perform quantitative estimations.
Analyze elemental composition of salts and evaluate real-world implications.
Interpret TLC principles and apply separation techniques for amino acids.
Apply arithmetic and logical expressions to solve problems using C.
Implement conditional statements to solve real-life problems.
Develop programs using loops and iteration for computational tasks.
Use functions to modularize solutions and simplify program execution.
Use structures and different storage methods to solve real-life problems.
Acquire skills in basic engineering practices and use various tools and machines.
Understand job drawings and develop jobs as per specifications.
Inspect and develop jobs to desired dimensions used in manufacturing.
Illustrate and analyze machines and equipment while adopting safety practices.
Identify and explain aims and objectives of Yoga and Physical Education.
Evaluate components of physical fitness and differentiate health-related fitness and wellness.
Assess effectiveness of specific yoga poses in managing health conditions like hypertension, obesity, back pain, diabetes and asthma.
